Begin WereCheckScript

;THIS SCRIPT WILL CHECK TO SEE IF THE PLAYER HAS HAD LYCANTHROPY DISEASE FOR 3 DAYS
;AFTER 3 DAYS, PLAYER WILL BE GIVEN HIRCINE BINK DREAM AND WILL BE GIVEN FULL BLOWN WEREWOLF-ISM
;SCRIPT WILL CHECK FOR DISEASE, CHECK TIME HAD, SET SOME VARIABLES, AND DO OTHER FUN THINGS SCRIPTS LIKE THIS SHOULD DO
;THOSE RESPONSIBLE FOR WRITING THIS SCRIPT HAVE BEEN SACKED

short currentDay
short dayCount
short hasDisease
short state

;PCWerewolf, 0 = Normal, 1 = Werewolf, -1 = Cured

if ( PCVampire == 1 ) ;MAKE SURE PC CAN'T BE VAMP AND WERE
	return
endif

if ( state == -1 )
	return
endif

if ( state == 10 )

	;MessageBox "You've just waited too long to get rid of Lycanthropy!"
	set state to -1
	StartScript WereChangeScript
	set PCWereWolf to 1		

endif

if ( PCWerewolf != 0 )
	stopscript WereCheckScript 	;stop this script if they become a werewolf
	return
endif

if ( player->GetSpell "werewolf blood" == 1 )
		;MessageBox "HAS WEREWOLF DISEASE!!!"
		if ( hasDisease == 0 )
			set hasDisease to 1
			;MessageBox "HASDISEASE SHOULD BE SET TO 1"
			set currentDay to Day
		endif

else
		if ( hasDisease == 1 )		;they had it at one point, but don't anymore
			set hasDisease to 0
			set currentDay to 0
			set dayCount to 0
		endif
endif


if ( hasDisease == 1 )			;has disease will get set back to 0 before here if they cured it

	if ( currentDay != day )	;the day has changed, so up the count

		set dayCount to dayCount + 1
		set currentDay to Day

	endif

	if ( dayCount >= 3 )	;goes over 3 days
		set state to 10
	endif

endif

End WereCheckScript
